pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Qase Python Commons## DescriptionThis package contains reporters for Qase TestOps and Qase Report that are used in [qase-pytest](https://github.com/qase-tms/qase-python/tree/master/qase-pytest) and [qase-robotframework](https://github.com/qase-tms/qase-python/tree/master/qase-robotframework).## How to install`pip install qase-python-commons`
